channel.title: Eagle|Ada County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Eagle|Ada County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-55 South at ID-44
item.description: ID-55 south at ID-44. ID-55 south joins ID-44 west through Eagle.

item.title: ID-55 South at ID-44
item.description: ID-55 south at ID-44. Use ID-44 west for Boise; use ID-44 East/ID-55 South for Eagle and Caldwell.

item.title: ID-44 West at ID-55
item.description: ID-44 west at ID-55. Turn right for ID-55 south; continue straight for ID-55 north/ID-44 east. ID-55 joins ID-44 through Eagle.

item.title: ID-44 East at ID-55
item.description: ID-44 east (State St.) at ID-55. Turn right on ID-55 (Eagle Road) for Meridian. Turn left on Eagle Road for Eagle (downtown). Continue straight on ID-44/ID-55 for Boise. ID-55 follows ID-44 through Eagle.

item.title: ID-44 East Approaching ID-55
item.description: ID-44 east approaching ID-55 in Eagle.

item.title: ID-44 West Approaching ID-55
item.description: ID-44 west at ID-55 north junction. ID-55 follows ID-44 west through Eagle. ID-55 northward is the Payette River Scenic Byway.

item.title: ID-44 West at ID-55 North
item.description: ID-44/ID-55 Junction in Eagle. ID-55 is one of the two main routes from southern Idaho to northern Idaho.
